name: Brain Bites
description:
Brain Bites was made during  the "185th WEEKLY GAMEJAM" with the theme "parasite".

A puzzle 2D platformer.

You, as the parasite that you are, take control of unexpecting employees at your local oil rig. Use Platforming and your parasitey-skills  to traverse the literal 10s of levels.
(there is like 10 or 11 levels, I can't remember)

"its like mario Odysessy but depressing and not at all" - My Mom

"As a game it is functional" - anonymous

"Sometimes I just get really scared,  and I don't know who to talk to about it." - me

Programming & Design - Crayon

Programming & Art - Evan

Music - Crayon2
